mapper.select: SELECT mat.match_idx, m2.m_email, m2.m_photo, rep.report_content, rep.m_report FROM member m1 JOIN member m2 JOIN report rep JOIN dream.match mat ON m2.m_idx=rep.report_idx AND m1.m_idx=rep.m_reported AND mat.match_idx=rep.match_idx WHERE m1.m_idx=#{arg0}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (match_idx, report_content, m_report, m_reported) VALUES (#{match_idx}, #{report_content}, #{m_report}, #{m_reported});
